## UseVisualStableUpdateOptions.customSortFunction property

Overwrites the default sort function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
customSortFunction?: (trackReferences: TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder[]) => TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder[];
```
